title: Twitter, Starbucks, Walmart: Stocks That Defined the Week
sub_head: Here are seven major companies whose shares moved on the week’s news
body:
Twitter Inc.
Elon Musk is ruffling feathers at Twitter. The CEO of Tesla Inc. will join the social-media platform’s board after Mr. Musk revealed his 9.2% stake in the company on Monday. Twitter also said on Wednesday it is working on adding an edit button—a function long-requested by many users—after Mr. Musk polled his Twitter followers on the feature. Twitter shares gained 27% Monday.
